entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] `InputBase` - allow correct async handling of `ValueChanged` callbacks with `SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync()` #59477
  • I upgraded to 17.12.3 and got a weird error about “DiscoverPrecompressedAssets” task failed unexpectedly. Did not have this issue before upgrading. #59476
  • Rebuild Fails in ASP.NET Project Using .NET Core 6.0 When Using bundleconfig.json, but Clean and Build Succeed #59475
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #59474
  • [Blazor] Get rid of special webassembly behavior in the static web assets SDK #59468
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Issue with StaticWebAssets in Blazor WebAssembly Hosted on .NET 9.0 #59466
    9.0.x
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59465

Closed

  • UserManager.CreateAsync(IdentityUser, Password) PasswordHash property not getting populated correctly #59471
  • .NET 9: `dotnet user-jwts` not working #58996
    9.0.x
  • Blazor WebApp Wasm Hot Reload does not work with UseRouting #52339
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Debugging & Hot Reload is Broken When App's Base Path is Changed #46809
    .NET 10 Planning
  • We are having trouble with both `0.0.0.0` and `0.0.0.1` with [Stripe Elements UI](https://docs.stripe.com/payments/payment-element) for collecting payment card details. #58415
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [OpenAPI] Not adding securitySchemas from document transformers #59454
  • OpenApi generation creates NullableOf version of structs when null is allowed? #59056
  • [Blazor] - Issue calling `submitRequest` on data-enhanced form #58244
    Backlog
  • Correlation failure #58780
  • AssemblyLoadContext cannot be released #59305
  • <input type="radio"> not binding with @bind in Blazor WASM in .NET9 #59235

PullRequests

Created

  • Do a few tricks to shorten the intermediate output paths for the runtime packs #59479
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0.x

Merged

  • Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59425
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `35d0c36` to `79219e2` #59470
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix up publishing of installers built with shared tooling #59463
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v21.0 #59387
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • Added simplified null checking. #59331
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Include signing key for ValidIssuer when loading JwtBearerOptions from config #59460
    community-contribution, area-security
  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
